mapper.sql: id, dic_code, dic_name, hierarchy, parent_id, ext1, update_time, create_time, update_user, create_user, state, flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from dictionary
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dictionary
id,
dic_code,
dic_name,
hierarchy,
parent_id,
ext1,
update_time,
create_time,
update_user,
create_user,
state,
flag,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dictionary
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dic_code = #{record.dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_name = #{record.dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hierarchy = #{record.hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ext1 = #{record.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update dictionary set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dic_code = #{record.dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_name = #{record.dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hierarchy = #{record.hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext1 = #{record.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update dictionary
dic_code = #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_name = #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hierarchy = #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dictionary set dic_code = #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_name = #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hierarchy = #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select d.create_time createTime,d.create_user createUser,d.dic_code dicCode, d.dic_name dicName,d.flag,d.hierarchy,d.id,d.parent_id parentId,d.state,d.update_time updateTime ,d.update_user updateUser,,d.ext1 from dictionary d where 1=1
and d.dic_name like "%"#{dicName}"%"
and d.dic_code=#{dicCode}
and d.flag!="1" and d.hierarchy="1"

select d.create_time createTime,d.create_user createUser,d.dic_code dicCode, d.dic_name dicName,d.flag,d.hierarchy,d.id,d.parent_id parentId,d.state,d.update_time updateTime ,d.update_user updateUser,d.ext1 from dictionary d where d.parent_id=#{id} and d.flag!="1"

select d.create_time createTime,d.create_user createUser,d.dic_code dicCode, d.dic_name dicName,d.flag,d.hierarchy,d.id,d.parent_id parentId,d.state,d.update_time updateTime ,d.update_user updateUser from dictionary d where d.dic_code=#{dicCode} and d.flag!="1"

select d.create_time createTime,d.create_user createUser,d.dic_code dicCode, d.dic_name dicName,d.flag,d.hierarchy,d.id,d.parent_id parentId,d.state,d.update_time updateTime ,d.update_user updateUser from dictionary d where d.dic_name=#{dicName} and d.flag!="1"
